function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Customers frequently engaging in prosocial behaviors that involve the food trucks and their businesses.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission through frequent customer interactions with the food trucks and their businesses.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols for food preparation, delivery, and customer interactions.","Technologies":"Contactless delivery systems, UV sterilization technology for food packaging, and digital payment methods to minimize physical contact.","People":"Customers, food truck staff, and the surrounding community.","Owner":"Food truck owners and operators."}]}
